profiles:
Summary I have been working in the event management fields for over 10 years and have managed my own event company for over ten years. I also have over five years of recruiting experience within the sales, marketing, tourism, and event industries. While living in San Francisco, I have worked on national and global experiential marketing campaigns with many executive accounts including Intuit, Nintendo, and Nike. As the Events Manager at ECOtality and Game Insight, I planned, managed and executed large-scale conferences across multiple markets and industries. I manage the entire event life cycle of planning, implementation and reconciliation for industry trade shows, partner symposiums and forums, speaking engagements, sponsorship opportunities and company-wide events.

I manage the entire event life cycle of planning, implementation and reconciliation for industry trade shows, partner symposiums and forums, speaking engagements, sponsorship opportunities and company-wide events.

Experience Account Executive Intel Corporation Accounts Executive INTEL TECHNOLOGY INDIA PVT LTD December 2011  – Present (3 years 9 months) ACCOUNTS EXECUTIVE INTEL TECHNOLOGY INDIA PVT LTD December 2011  – Present (3 years 9 months) Handle internal and external Audits. 
Checking mails and responding to the query accordingly. 
Preparation of the CA certificate for obtaining the cenvat credit on the duties and services paid by the client which is located in SEZ area 
Maintenance of the back end papers for CA certification and for submission of claims to department (LTU). 
Monthly service tax payment computation to the third party vendor. 
Preparing Bank Reconciliation Statements. 
Follow up with the concerned officer for the procurement of required data in order to prepare claim sheet. 
Interacting with the seniors, managers about the process carried on by us. 
Preparation of consolidated statements for which service tax has been paid like Claim sheet for local service tax, A2- third party (outside country), A2 – Intercompany and Mapping of payments with Accounts payable & receivable. 
Preparation of claim sheets for getting hard copies of documents like local ST invoices, A2 – Third party payments, A2 – Intercompany payments, Duty bills etc. 
Updating claim sheet with vendor name, Service tax reg. no, service tax amount, maintaining registers properly. 
Follow up with vendors for any queries and sort out . 
Providing the necessary documents to the senior officials, if needed. 
Follow up with Logistics departments for the duty bills and other related invoices with finance stores dept.  
Responsible for maintain all the records such as copy of SMG,CVD Duty bill,A2- Third party payments , A2 – Inter co. payments and Local payments invoices etc. for our smooth flow of operations and for all the external and internal auditing Purpose. 
Coordinating with Purchase department and Finance department for all Vendor payment quires and providing them all the necessary documents for closing vendor payments and for intercompany settlements. 
Responsible for handling all the internal quires from the finance dept Jr. ACCOUNTS EXECUTIVE Pranava Integrated Technology Pvt. Ltd December 2008  –  October 2011  (2 years 11 months) Checking mails and responding to the query accordingly. 
Knowledge of filing , Record keeping & Tracking history. 
Day to Day Accounting Activities. 
Using Tally wherever needed. 
Data Entry of Sales, Purchase Bills, Cash & Bank transactions. 
Taking care of the Banking transactions and Preparing vouchers. 
Keeping the client in the loop at all phases of the campaign 
Handling invoices and tax receipts 
Clearing up the ongoing negotiations and making way for the new ones with clients.

Summary I am a skilled sales and business development professional with an exceptional understanding of customer needs, and have consistently achieved quota throughout my career. 
 
Highlights of my career thus far include my current role as an Inside Sales Manager at Intel in the Mobile and Wireless Sales group, and previous account executive roles at global companies such as Citrix Systems and Wildfire by Google. 
 
I recently received a Masters in Business Administration (MBA) at Argosy University, and prior to that, a professional marketing certificate from the University of California, San Diego, and a Bachelor of Arts in International Affairs from the University of Colorado. Summary I am a skilled sales and business development professional with an exceptional understanding of customer needs, and have consistently achieved quota throughout my career. 
 
Highlights of my career thus far include my current role as an Inside Sales Manager at Intel in the Mobile and Wireless Sales group, and previous account executive roles at global companies such as Citrix Systems and Wildfire by Google. 
 
I recently received a Masters in Business Administration (MBA) at Argosy University, and prior to that, a professional marketing certificate from the University of California, San Diego, and a Bachelor of Arts in International Affairs from the University of Colorado. I am a skilled sales and business development professional with an exceptional understanding of customer needs, and have consistently achieved quota throughout my career. 
 
Highlights of my career thus far include my current role as an Inside Sales Manager at Intel in the Mobile and Wireless Sales group, and previous account executive roles at global companies such as Citrix Systems and Wildfire by Google. 
 
I recently received a Masters in Business Administration (MBA) at Argosy University, and prior to that, a professional marketing certificate from the University of California, San Diego, and a Bachelor of Arts in International Affairs from the University of Colorado. Experience Account Executive Wind River (Intel Subsidiary) June 2014  – Present (1 year 3 months) San Francisco Bay Area Account Executive Intel Corporation (dba Wind River) April 2012  – Present (3 years 5 months) San Francisco Bay Area Inside Sales Manager Intel Corporation April 2012  –  June 2014  (2 years 3 months) San Francisco Bay Area •Sales position in the world’s largest and highest valued semiconductor chipmaker. Currently working within Mobile Wireless Sales group, with responsibility for sales and marketing in the Americas, liaising with manufacturing and engineering sites in Asia and Europe. 
•Responsibilities include sales, account management (assisting sales team, speaking with clients, liaising with sample managers), logistics (CMF shipping codes, SAP, CSARs, RMAs, NDAs, IPLAs), reporting (CRM, PCN, etc.), and managing the extended sales force as requested.  
•Currently managing FFRD ODM Sample Shipment program for ASMO region. This consists of coordinating with various groups in the ASMO region (Field Sales, CMM, SPG, ESS, RCO/Channel, etc.) 
•Active participation on the Amazon (Lab126) and Motorola Sales Teams 
•Experience in contract negotiations working with multi-discipline teams (legal, logistics, engineering, sales, finance, etc.) 
•Solid experience working with international customers, account teams and intercompany locations. Account Executive Wildfire By Google 2011  –  2012  (1 year) Redwood City, CA •Field sales position with a global software company that provides brands and agencies the tools to grow, engage, monetize, and measure performance of their social media presence. 
•Responsibilities included development and execution of aligned sales strategy, direct sales management, contract negotiation, channel sales, and strategic partnership development. 
•Exceeded my quotas at all levels in 2011. 
•Left Wildfire for expanded responsibilities at Intel Corporation 
•Company was acquired by Google in 2012 Account Executive Partner Specialist SOS Online Backup 2008  –  2010  (2 years) Torance, CA •Sales position with an early stage software company that specialized in providing online network backup to businesses for data management, information security, and disaster recovery solutions. 
•My responsibilities included direct sales, contract negotiation, sales strategy, channel sales, and strategic partnership development. 
•Closed in excess of $500,000 in direct sales, more than $200,000 in partner sales, and set up new channels with potential contract value targeted to exceed over $1,000,000. 
•Consistently achieved in excess of 100% of quota. 
•Left the company to pursue my MBA on a full-time basis. Account Executive MeetingSense Software Corporation 2007  –  2008  (1 year) San Diego, CA •Sales position with a startup software company that specialized in a meeting efficiency tool to help companies capture, store, and track meeting notes and action items. 
•Responsibilities included direct sales, sales strategy, strategic sales, partnership development, and inside sales management for the sales team. Successfully communicated with the field sales team and with customers to close and execute orders and develop business relationships. 
•Brought in annual contracts valued at over $200,000 in revenue, and set up a strategic channel targeting revenue in excess of $1,000,000. 
•Top dialer; average 70+ calls a day, surpassed quota. 
•Company ran out of funding faster than planned, and cut staffing to the bone to maximize their runway. Account Executive Citrix Online 2006  –  2007  (1 year) Phoenix, AZ •Sales position with the Online Division of Citrix Systems, a mid-sized, Web-based access, support and collaboration software and services company.  
•Responsible for selling corporate versions of online collaboration products as “Software as a Service” (SaaS) for online meetings/seminars, PC remote access, and remote support tools to small and medium sized businesses.  
•Responsible for sales to French Canada. 
•Top dialer; average 70+ calls a day, 125% of quota. 
•Closed contracts valued in excess of $600,000 in revenue. 
•100% Club Summit, Top Tier of sales people at Citrix Online where I received their Sales Merit Award. 
•Left to join a start-up software company in San Diego, CA.
